name: Cellular Automata Playground
description: A tool to explore cellular automata with various rules.

name: TempoGDX
description: An open source metronome app built with libGDX.

name: Map of Thedas
description: A searchable map of Thedas - the Dragon Age world.

name: Karcero
description: A procedural dungeon tile based map generator.

name: Game of Music
description: A music sequencer that uses Conway's Game of Life's rules to generate each state. Build and share a url directly to your track.

name: Super Fantasy Queue
description: Super Fantasy Queue is a short game about the most important decision a hero could make - which line to stand in. Made for Github's 2013 game off jam.

name: caseIt
description: A simple web tool for text transformations designed to work with keyboard shortcuts.
